# <ins>BAR-Tweaks</ins>
Beyond All Reason Lua Script Tweaks/Mods
Use ```!bset tweakdefs code``` to apply.

To apply multiple tweaks at once use ```!bset tweakdefs1 code``` ```!bset tweakdefs2 code``` etc...

Copy the codes below.
### <ins>All Faction Commander</ins>
Lets all commanders the ability to build any factions T1 Lab.
Supports Evolving commanders.
```

```

### <ins>Faction Agnostic Mod</ins>
Lets all labs build all factions unit of the same tier and type.
```

```

### <ins>Disable Jamming/Stealth</ins>
Removes jamming and stealthy abilities outright.
```

```

### <ins>Disable Tyrannus/Dragon</ins>
Removes Tyrannus/Dragon from Advanced Air Labs
```

```

### <ins>Underwater DGun</ins>
Enables all commanders to use DGun underwater.
Supports evolving commanders.
Note: The DGun projectile is above the water does not kill submersible
```

```

### <ins>ConTurret BuildOptions</ins>
Enables T1 and T2 Construction Turrets to have same build options as constructors of same tier.
Note: Removed T3 Eco/Air
```

```
